channel.title: How can i make my cache file of my client autodownload and extract in a 508 WC
channel.description:
WC stands for webclient. i'm making a 508 webclient but can't figure out how to make it work? I want my client to auto download the cache file from a rar file on a website and extract it so the server works. If anyone can help me PLEASE CONTACT ME VIA THIS TOPIC OR VIA EMAIL
r_i_338@hotmail.com <<msn
or my website www.riip.net
